zhao.algorithmMagic.operands.matrix

类 ImageMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • zhao.algorithmMagic.operands.vector.Vector<ImplementationType,ElementType,ArrayType>
      • zhao.algorithmMagic.operands.vector.ASVector<ImplementationType,ElementType,ArrayType>
        • zhao.algorithmMagic.operands.matrix.Matrix<ColorMatrix,Color,Color[],Color[],Color[][]>
          • zhao.algorithmMagic.operands.matrix.ColorMatrix
            • zhao.algorithmMagic.operands.matrix.ImageMatrix
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ImageObserver, Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Color[]>, SaveMatrix, Operands<ColorMatrix>

    public class ImageMatrix
extends ColorMatrix
implements ImageObserver
    针对 ColorMatrix 矩阵对象的封装类，其是Color矩阵的子类，具有更加强大的性能。

    Encapsulation class for ColorMatrix matrix objects, which is a subclass of the Color matrix and has more powerful performance.

    作者:
    赵凌宇 2023/6/12 12:14
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ImageMatrix

        protected ImageMatrix(int rowCount,
                      int colCount,
                      Color[][] colors,
                      boolean isGrayscale)
        构造一个指定行列数据的矩阵对象，其中的行指针最大值将会默认使用行数量。

        Construct a matrix object with specified row and column data. The maximum value of row pointer will use the number of rows by default.

        参数:
        rowCount - 矩阵中的行数量

        the number of rows in the matrix

        colCount - 矩阵中的列数量

        the number of cols in the matrix

        colors - 该矩阵对象中的二维数组对象。
        isGrayscale - 如果设置为true 代表此图像是灰度图像

      • ImageMatrix

        protected ImageMatrix(int rowCount,
                      int colCount,
                      Color[][] colors,
                      BufferedImage image,
                      boolean isGrayscale)
        构造一个指定行列数据的矩阵对象，其中的行指针最大值将会默认使用行数量。

        Construct a matrix object with specified row and column data. The maximum value of row pointer will use the number of rows by default.

        参数:
        rowCount - 矩阵中的行数量

        the number of rows in the matrix

        colCount - 矩阵中的列数量

        the number of cols in the matrix

        colors - 该矩阵对象中的二维数组对象。

        The two-dimensional array object in this matrix object.

        image - 当前矩阵对象中需要存储的 image 对象。

        The image object that needs to be stored in the current matrix object.

        isGrayscale - 如果设置为true 代表此图像是灰度图像。

        If set to true, this image is Grayscale.

      • parse

        public static ColorMatrix parse(File inputFile,
                                int... v)
        根据图像文件获取到整形矩阵对象，在整形矩阵对象中会包含该图像的每一个像素点对应的整形数值。

        The reshaping matrix object is obtained from the image file, and the reshaping value corresponding to each pixel of the image will be included in the reshaping matrix object.

        参数:
        inputFile - 要读取的目标图像文件路径。

        The target image file path to read.

        v - 矩阵中的所有图像的尺寸参数。

        The size parameters of all images in the matrix.

        返回:
        根据图像获取到的矩阵对象。

        The matrix object obtained from the image.

      • expand

        public ImageMatrix expand()
        从接口复制的说明: Operands

        Transforming the current object into its subclass implementation has a powerful type extension effect, enabling the conversion operation from parent class to subclass.

      • extractImage

        public ColorMatrix extractImage(int x1,
                                int y1,
                                int x2,
                                int y2)
        从图像矩阵中截取出一块空间，并返回这一块空间对应的图像矩阵，注意：这块空间与原图像直接没有任何关系，您可以使用 merge 函数将这块空间合并到原图像。

        Intercept a space from the image matrix and return the image matrix corresponding to this space. Note: this space has no direct relationship with the original image. You can use the merge function to merge this space into the original image.

        覆盖:
        extractImage 在类中 ColorMatrix
        参数:
        x1 - 原图像矩阵中的提取起始x坐标

        Extracting the starting x coordinate in the original image matrix

        y1 - 原图像矩阵中的提取起始y坐标

        Extraction of starting y coordinate in the original image matrix

        x2 - 原图像矩阵中的提取终止y坐标

        Extraction termination y coordinate in the original image matrix

        y2 - 原图像矩阵中的提取终止y坐标

        Extraction termination y coordinate in the original image matrix

        返回:
        从原图像中提取出来的一块图像矩阵对象。

        An image matrix object extracted from the original image.

      • extractImageSrc

        public ColorMatrix extractImageSrc(int y1,
                                   int y2)
        使用浅拷贝的方式将照片的多行向量提取出来并构成一个新的矩阵对象，形成一个新的图像矩阵。

        Using a shallow copy method, the multiline vectors of a photo are extracted and formed into a new matrix object, forming a new image matrix.

        覆盖:
        extractImageSrc 在类中 ColorMatrix
        参数:
        y1 - 提取图像的起始纵坐标轴点。

        Extract the starting ordinate axis point of the image.

        y2 - 提取图像的终止纵坐标轴点。

        Extract the ending ordinate axis point of the image.

        返回:
        原矩阵中的 y1 y2 的局部像素勾成的新图像矩阵对象。

        The local pixels of y1 and y2 in the original matrix form a new image matrix object.

      • reSize

        public ImageMatrix reSize(int newWidth,
                          int newHigh)
        将当前图像的尺寸进行缩放，使得图像能够在不改变自身样貌的前提下将尺寸更改。

        Scales the size of the current image so that the image can be resized without changing its appearance.

        参数:
        newWidth - 缩放之后的矩阵尺寸数值 - 宽。

        The matrix size value after scaling - width.

        newHigh - 缩放之后的矩阵尺寸数值 - 高。

        The matrix size value after scaling - high.

        返回:

        The new image matrix object after scaling.

      • toImage

        public final Image toImage()
        将当前的图像矩阵对象转换成为 Image 对象。

        Convert the current image matrix object into an Image object.

        返回:
        当前矩阵对象中存储的 Java Image 对象，需要注意的是，此返回的数值不支持修改操作。

        The Java Image object stored in the front matrix object should be noted that this object does not support modification operations.

      • copyToNewImage

        public final BufferedImage copyToNewImage()
        以拷贝的方式获取到本矩阵中的 Image 对象，并将次对象返回出去。

        Obtain the Image object in this matrix by copying and return the secondary object.

        返回:
        拷贝方式获取到的 Image 对象，该对象支持修改，其与源矩阵无任何关联。

        The Image object obtained by copying method supports modification and has no association with the source matrix.

      • imageUpdate

        public boolean imageUpdate(Image img,
                           int infoflags,
                           int x,
                           int y,
                           int width,
                           int height)
        This method is called when information about an image which was previously requested using an asynchronous interface becomes available. Asynchronous interfaces are method calls such as getWidth(ImageObserver) and drawImage(img, x, y, ImageObserver) which take an ImageObserver object as an argument. Those methods register the caller as interested either in information about the overall image itself (in the case of getWidth(ImageObserver)) or about an output version of an image (in the case of the drawImage(img, x, y, [w, h,] ImageObserver) call).

        This method should return true if further updates are needed or false if the required information has been acquired. The image which was being tracked is passed in using the img argument. Various constants are combined to form the infoflags argument which indicates what information about the image is now available. The interpretation of the x, y, width, and height arguments depends on the contents of the infoflags argument.

        The infoflags argument should be the bitwise inclusive OR of the following flags: WIDTH, HEIGHT, PROPERTIES, SOMEBITS, FRAMEBITS, ALLBITS, ERROR, ABORT.

        指定者:
        imageUpdate 在接口中 ImageObserver
        参数:
        img - the image being observed.
        infoflags - the bitwise inclusive OR of the following flags: WIDTH, HEIGHT, PROPERTIES, SOMEBITS, FRAMEBITS, ALLBITS, ERROR, ABORT.
        x - the x coordinate.
        y - the y coordinate.
        width - the width.
        height - the height.
        返回:
        false if the infoflags indicate that the image is completely loaded; true otherwise.
        另请参阅:
        ImageObserver.WIDTH, ImageObserver.HEIGHT, ImageObserver.PROPERTIES, ImageObserver.SOMEBITS, ImageObserver.FRAMEBITS, ImageObserver.ALLBITS, ImageObserver.ERROR, ImageObserver.ABORT, Image.getWidth(java.awt.image.ImageObserver), Image.getHeight(java.awt.image.ImageObserver), Graphics.drawImage(java.awt.Image, int, int, java.awt.image.ImageObserver)

      • getSerialVersionUID

        public long getSerialVersionUID()
        覆盖:
        getSerialVersionUID 在类中 ColorMatrix
        返回:
        当前对象或类的序列化数值，相同类型的情况下该数值是相同的。

        The serialized value of the current object or class, which is the same for the same type.
